extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Third year standing or above
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from ARTH 322/3.0; ARTH 324/3.0.

basic.description: An investigation into the sources of impressionism, its diffusion in Europe, reactions to impressionism and alternate traditions up to 1900.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Impressionism and Post-Impressionism
